mass_balance.documentation: The Center of Gravity location, empty weight, in aircraft's own structural coord system.

function.name: aero/coefficients/cm_ac-h-wing
function.description: pitching moment coeff due to wing lift in ac

function.name: aero/coefficients/cm_ac-h-aoa
function.description: Cm of aircraft less tail due to increase of aoa

function.name: aero/coefficients/cm_ac-h-drag
function.description: moment change due to wing drag vector not in ac cg

function.name: aero/coefficients/cm_ac-h-flap
function.description: moment coeff due to flap deflection

function.name: aero/coefficients/cm_ac-h
function.description: total moment coeff aircraft minus tail

function.name: aircraft/wing/etha-deg
function.description: downwash angle due to wing lift

function.name: velocities/hstab/v-fps
function.description: airspeed at stabilizer in xz plane

function.name: aircraft/hstab/elevator/ch_de-prad
function.description: moment coeff around elevator hinge line due to its deflection

function.name: aircraft/hstab/elevator/ch_alpha-prad
function.description: moment coeff around elevator hinge line due to local angle of attack

function.name: aircraft/hstab/elevator/H-nz-lbsft
function.description: static moment coeff around elevator hinge line times nz

function.name: aircraft/hstab/elevator/H-ds-lbsft
function.description: moment coeff around elevator hinge line due to down spring

function.name: aircraft/hstab/elevator/H-bw-lbsft
function.description: moment coeff around elevator hinge line due to bobweight

function.name: aero/force/Side_vstab
function.description: Side force due to vert fin

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_beta
function.description: Roll moment due to vert fin

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_damp
function.description: Roll moment due to roll rate

function.name: aero/moment/M_beta
function.description: Pitch moment due to vert fin

function.name: aero/moment/N_beta
function.description: yaw moment due to vert fin
